description:
Sketchy rock gardens and surprise step-ups are just easier when you don’t have to worry about slipping a pedal. The Xpresso 4 pedals are designed for riders that like to shred trails clipped in. Machined from a light and strong aluminum these pedals can stand up to anything the trail will throw at them. A slim profile tucks perfectly underfoot, so you can thread through rocks and roots. And the open clip design clears dirt and debris with ease, so your clips work just like they should, regardless of the forecast.

  • Lightweight aluminum body is strong enough to handle kissing the occasional rock
  • 4 adjustable and replaceable grub pins bite into your shoe for extra grip
  • Adjustable tensioning system lets you dial in the perfect amount of retention for your style of riding
  • Wide angle step in design means less slips and more confidence
  • ATAC cleats clear your pedals of dirt and debris every time you step in
  • Includes ATAC standard cleats with a 13° and 17° release angle
name: Time Speciale 8 Pedals
